name: Descent into the Dread Pit of Ugzat
name_original: Descent into the Dread Pit of Ugzat
description: The Dread Sorcerer Merdac is breeding an army of improved goblins in the Pit of Ugzat under the supervision of Dreadlord Valdis. Descend this hellish breeding pit to defeat Merdac and stop his efforts. The Dreadlord is a powerful ally to Zargon, defeating him would deal a devastating blow to the Evil Wizard. Return to the Iron Door entrance to complete this mission, the King will reward your group with 300 Gold Coins to be divided as you see fit.
